new_src_summary: 在这一段描写中，故事情节围绕唐舞麟及其队友与神秘女子琰凤之间的激烈战斗展开。琰凤刚成为一字斗铠师，兴奋之余却遭到唐舞麟一行人的围攻，尽管他们并无恶意。她的斗铠显著提升了实力，瞬间达到七环级别，令唐舞麟意识到战胜她的难度加大。此时，蓝银金光阵试图压制琰凤的火葫芦攻击，但她反击迅速，展现出强大的魂力与变身能力，身体上出现火红色光环并形成暗红色甲胄，进一步增强了战斗力。唐舞麟在战斗中展现出惊人的斗铠能力，令琰凤感到震惊。琰凤回忆起获得斗铠的经历，认为唐舞麟在如此年轻的年纪就拥有斗铠实属罕见，暗示他可能是天才。随着战斗的展开，唐舞麟积极应对，接连食用恢复魂力的包子，以强攻系战魂师的身份奋力抵挡敌人的攻击，展现出强大的实力和决心。整体风格为奇幻冒险与战斗相结合，语气紧张而充满悬念，突显角色间的对抗与力量的较量，以及唐舞麟作为队长的责任感与勇气，为应对强敌而全力以赴。
new_tgt_summary: In Chapter 437, the activation of the Blue Silver Golden Light Array momentarily dims the flames, but the Fire Gourd quickly siphons the flames and escapes. The situation escalates when a woman in dark red armor, wearing a distinctive phoenix helmet, reappears with murderous intent. Tang Wulin and his team confront her, weapons drawn, but she unleashes a powerful surge of soul power accompanied by a phoenix cry, significantly boosting her strength and creating a massive fiery ring that violently repels them. Tang Wulin realizes she possesses a complete one-word battle armor, indicating her cultivation level has surged from five rings to seven. Yan Feng, recently recognized as a one-word battle armor master, feels threatened by Tang Wulin and his companions, leading her to attack despite their intentions to cause no harm. As she launches a fierce flame attack, Tang Wulin prepares to counter with his own battle armor, knowing he must give it his all against this formidable opponent. Yan Feng is astonished by Tang Wulin's battle armor manifesting at such a young age, questioning whether he possesses a two-word battle armor. Reflecting on her own experience of acquiring her first battle armor at twenty-one, she finds his talent extraordinary. As Tang Wulin readies for battle, his teammate Xu Lizhi provides him with buns to restore soul power, indicating a quick confrontation is imminent. Fueled by the power of the Golden Dragon King, Tang Wulin unleashes a powerful aura and transforms, prepared to face the opponent's flames while ensuring his teammates have a chance to succeed. Yan Feng is left wondering if he might be a twin martial soul.
